definition: content/calm/still/quiet/safe/secure/in good health/to find a place for/to install/to fix/to fit/to bring (a charge against sb)/to pacify/to harbor (good intentions)/security/safety/peace/ampere
surname Ji/abbr. for Jilin Province 吉林省[Ji2 lin2 Sheng3]

sentences.english: Andrea, the first named storm of the year is spinning off the coast.
sentences.chinese: 安吉爾，這一年第一個被命名的風暴正在海岸邊盤旋。

sentences.english: Angell went to Taiyuan in company with his wife.
sentences.chinese: 安吉爾和他夫人一起去太原。

sentences.english: Angel and I usually cook in bulk for the entire week on Sunday evenings.
sentences.chinese: 安吉爾和我通常在週日晚上批量烹調一整週的食物。

sentences.english: Angie ready to test the snorkeling gear at Magic Island.
sentences.chinese: 安吉爾準備在幻島測試一下通氣管。

sentences.english: Roughly six months after I met Brianna, I met Angel.
sentences.chinese: 大約是與布麗安娜的相逢後六個月，我遇到了安吉爾。

sentences.english: Why can’t I write Angel a love poem?
sentences.chinese: 爲什麼我寫不出一首獻給安吉爾的情詩？

sentences.english: The company is "Angel" water purification products in Guangdong Province of distribution.
sentences.chinese: 本公司是“安吉爾”淨水產品的廣東省總經銷。
